On Monday 18 May 2009, mike amundsen wrote:
> GET /possible-targets/?oscar=best-picture-2009 
> returns a list of valid drop targets.

If you consider a list containing every movie shot in that year 
possible, I'd have to agree. I reckon there must be a better strategy.

Michael
